name: Water-malone (LIve Mixing: SUMMERTIME RECIPES)
description:
Excellent Sweet Watermelon Vape
Made for LIVE MIXING: Summertime Vapes
-> http://diyordievaping.com/2017/07/05/water-malone-diy-e-liquid-recipe/
author: ENYAWREKLAW

reviews.text: I really liked this flavour but as others has said its harsh...I can just about get passed it though.
The taste is good but man, it’s harsh. After a 2 week steep, it’s harsh to the point I’ll probably toss it.
I love this but took out the Wild Melon because it reminds me of cantaloupe.   Thank you so much for this one!!!  I would have never in a million years thought to pair watermelon with double apple!!!

Theres a lot of people who hate on Wayne so he must be doing something right. For the recors this is a good watermelon and the cap double apple goes well with the watermelon mix. Maybe the apple is a bit too high for some, but you can always lower it, if that's the case. I like to add a little Purlium Watermelon to this or MB Big WM to it. But even alone its a good waternelon. Definitely a classic now.
Harsh harsh apple is all I get from this unfortunately and I'm not the only one... All the hype for nothing really... Borninfire138 did a version of this and it's awesome!
Pure awsomeness
Its tasty and all, but its harsh like hell - what can i do about it ?

Awesome watermelon! When I ran out of FLV Watermelon I just started buying the one shot because this is all I used it for. Now this is the only watermelon I vape and I use the one shot as a base @ 5% for a koolada water-berry recipe that I made for my wife. She absolutely adores it. Excellent job.
Got the One Shot knowing how good everyone thinks this recipe is. And they are not wrong. Very nice sweet watermelon. But to me it lacks something that I expect in a watermelon. Not sure what :P

This is the best watermelon recipe I have ever tried. The only two things that I could critic is that it is a little harsh and that even after 5 days of steep I can still identify the Double Apple in the mix. Great job!
Dude, i'm a dessert guy and I think you just sunk my  battleship. Hello fruits ...
No need to talk about this profile, see other reviews. Been vaping this for a few months and bloody great
Solid watermelon vape even has an authentic ripe melon taste. Most melon vapes i have had are on the candied side. Even vapes really moist like a fresh watermelon. Excellent job

i was expecting this to be great with the hype but the throat hit is insane i tried lowering the apple to no avail then decided to remove it didn't work i think this would be better with a different apple idk

It worked perfectly as a shake n' vape, but I believe a day or two of steep will provide something extra... Did have Wild Watermelon, so I used Sweet Watermelon, and for my tast it was awesome, surely my new adv, I miss a little more sweetness, so I'll try just increasing the super sweet a little and the sweet watermelon
Just finally mixed this up. Excellent mix! Was looking forward to trying this for a while.
One of the best recipes for DIY. Authentic watermellon down to the rind.

Nice recipe, the double apple(which i SFT and noticed the mealy texture) really does provide a nice texture that feels like biting into fresh watermelon. I would however drop the percentage of double apple down to 2-3% as the apple flavor is a bit too forward and distracts from the pure juicy watermelon profile you were going for. I think I will try adding a small percentage of a slightly more candied watermelon too, such as SC Watermelon, or MB Big Watermelon, as this tastes a bit under ripe to me. All in all this is a wonderful recipe that could be absolutely amazing with a small tweak or two. Awesome summer vape especially with 1% of ws-23 added.

I like this for a summer mix but I prefer a bit more candy Watermelon. The amount of double apple with the honeydew in the wild melon definitely bring the green forward. I get a whole lot of green apple from it.

Enjoyed the recipe overall but I find the Apple component being too bright and tart for my taste, I lowered the Double Apple to 1.5% and added FA Juicy Strawberry at 1% and maked the Watermelon juicier and realistic.
This is the best w/melon recipe i have ever mixed 5 stars
Pretty much like vaping a slice of a ripe watermelon with some of the green rind still on it. Banging.
AMAZING, got the oneshot, vaped 120ml in 2 days, had to order the (FLV)Watermelon & (FLV)Wild Melon, got me on a wild melon kick ordering way too many flavors.
This is my favorite watermelon vape. It's sometimes a bit too sweet, but it disappears as the liquid steeps. I love it.
I mixed this quite a bit over the summer.  If I want a watermelon vape, this is it.

This is the watermelon recipe I have been waiting for. Nice and fleshy, light, with a bit of sweetness. Taste just like eating a perfectly ripe seedless Watermelon with a touch of sugar sprinkled on top.
I love how the apple works so well in this to keep it from being so light.  I'm about to make a big'ol batch of this for later
My favorite watermelon vape S&V certified. Awesome job for a live mixing
its pretty damn good but since I don't have wild melon I used tfa pear and it makes it pretty good
